title: Abnormally huge ping spikes across everyone in my game
body:
Hi, 

Just wondering why i, and everyone else in my game, were getting 5k ping spikes on and off throughout the last game that i played. not sure if you guys are doing maintenance or there are any problems with the server, but i get a loss nonetheless because everytime we would have a fight there would be spikes between 250-5000 ping. Normally get a loss prevented or something when the server goes to poo during a game, but it went down as a loss this time.

replies.body: If both sides were getting lag at crucial events, why would that cause **your team specifically** to lose?
It's pissing me off so much I might just go postal. It's reasons like this why I haven't spent a dime on this game since early last year.
It has happened to me, sometimes it's my internet, sometimes it's riot servers and we all actually dc for a few seconds.
